modelId.description: Gets or sets the id of the model, which will be used.

text.description: Gets or sets the text to classify

ClassifyTextAsyncRequest.description: Represents an request to classify a text async.

jobId.description:
Gets or sets the job id.
Its the id to check the aws query.

state.description:
Gets or sets the state of the job.
e.g. processing, complete or failed.

stateText.description: Gets or sets a state text with more informations about the state.

results.description: Gets or sets a list of the results.

ClassifyTextAsyncResponse.description: Represents an response of a text classification action.

predictedLabel.description: Gets or sets the predicted label.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the context

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the referenced context.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the context system

contextMessage.description:
Gets or sets a message, that represents a manual context.
If this is set, togehter with Name and Id, both will be passed to the AI

id.description: Gets or sets the conversation id

userId.description: Gets or sets the user the llm conversation is attached to

model.description: Gets or sets the LLM model, e.g. gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4

messages.description: Gets or sets the messages inside the conversation

createDateTime.description: Gets or sets the creation date time

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the task

reason.description: Gets or sets the reason that will be used from a llm, to use this task

requires.description: Gets or sets the required information, to use this task

optionalSubtask.description: Gets or sets subtask, which should be included automatically

CreateLLMTaskRequest.description: Request object for creating an llm task

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the model base.

type.description:
Gets or sets the type of the model base.
as example. aws-comprehend-multi-classification

state.description:
Gets or sets the state of the base model.
new, training, completed and failed.s

trainingFormatData.description:
Gets or sets the format of the training data.
e.g. csv.

delimiter.description: Gets or sets the delimiter for the data.

labelDelimiter.description: Gets or sets the delimiter for the labels.

CreateTextClassificationModelRequest.description: Represents an request to create a new model to text classification.

content.description: Gets or sets the document content

dataType.description: Gets or sets the data type

addToSearchIndex.description: Gets or sets whether to add the embedding to a search index

disable.description: Gets or sets whether disabling the embedding model

dataType.description: Gets or sets the data type (null/empty string will search everywhere)

count.description: Gets or sets the used documents (count)

disable.description: Gets or sets whether disabling the embedding model

LLMConnectorModel.description: Contains the settings for the llm connector

LLMTaskDefinitionModel.description: Represents an abstract version of a llm task

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the task

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the task

reason.description: Gets or sets the reason that will be used from a llm, to use this task

requires.description: Gets or sets the required information, to use this task

optionalSubtask.description: Gets or sets subtask, which should be included automatically

id.description: Gets or sets the message id

senderId.description: Gets or sets the sender. Ox user id, null for llm model

dateTime.description: Gets or sets the datetime the message was created

body.description: Gets or sets the message body

modelReference.description: Gets or sets an optional model reference for the message

conversationId.description: Gets or sets the conversation id

message.description: Gets or sets the initial message

ReplyToConversationRequest.description: Model for interacting with a conversation

model.description: Gets or sets the LLM model, e.g. gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4

message.description: Gets or sets the initial message

state.description: Gets or sets the status value

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the text classification model.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the model base.

type.description:
Gets or sets the type of the model base.
as example. aws-comprehend-multi-classification

state.description:
Gets or sets the state of the base model.
new, training, completed and failed.s

stateText.description:
Gets or sets the current state text.
Its a text with more information about the state.

trainingFormatData.description:
Gets or sets the format of the training data.
e.g. csv.

delimiter.description: Gets or sets the delimiter for the data.

labelDelimiter.description: Gets or sets the delimiter for the labels.

trainingDataPath.description:
Gets or sets the actually trainings data.
Its a path to a csv file in a aws bucket.

version.description: Gets or sets the current model version

label.description: Gets or sets the matched label.

confidence.description: Gets or sets the confidence, how good the label matches the text.

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer 12345abcdef"
Bearer.name: Authorization
